DOC.HEADLINE: NEWSWIRE
DOC.TEXT: Auto Racing Derrike Cope earned his first victory since 1990 when leader Hermie Sadler ran_out of gas with six laps to go_in the New England Chevy Dealers 250 , a NASCAR Grand_National race at the New Hampshire International Speedway in Loudon . Cope ' s Ford had moved_into second place , ahead of Bobby Dotter , only seconds before Sadler dropped out.Cope ' s last victory had been in a Winston Cup race at Dover , Del . He earned $ 32 # 400 and averaged only 88.560 m.p.h. in a race slowed by several wrecks over the one-mile oval . An official at Imola , Italy , where Ayrton Senna fatally crashed a week ago , said the Brazilian driver had inspected the stretch of the track where the accident occurred and declared it OK . Miscellany The Minnesota legislature passed a bill to authorize a public buyout of the Target Center arena in Minneapolis , a move which it intended to keep the NBA Timberwolves in Minnesota after attempts to move them to New Orleans or Nashville , Tenn . Gov . Arne Carlson said he would sign the bill as soon as it gets_to his office .
